markdownRemark.html:
Liferay DXP 7.4 has a powerful GraphQL query API that provides a single endpoint for data requests, which simplifies application development. Liferay REST APIs are well documented and intuitive to work with but having the ability to start typing what you want to query and seeing the results displayed is very handy.

In the following example, we will get a list of Blog entires Liferay DXP.

First, we need to authenticate to Liferay DXP with a user that has the correct roles and permissions.

Then navigate to /o/api/
